name: Phillip Schulz's Brine Cure For Smoked Bluefish
keywords: amber rum, honey, kosher salt, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a ceramic, glass or stainless-steel bowl. Mr. Schulz marinates large bluefish fillets, more than 1 pound each, 2 days in this brine. Smaller fillets can be marinated 1 day or overnight.
